attributes.action: take action against the Indonesian Government kidnapping children to force them to fight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Indonesian government soldiers are kidnapping children to force them to fight! The main targets are children of the Tsunami! Preying on the most vulnerable by taking advantage of the ones who have been orphaned or displaced. The Tamil Tigers are also very guilty of this crime against humanity!  Every effort must be made to stop this unconscionable recruiting from families who have already suffered so much.
